WorkItem.Summary: [Retribution] Huge red X in the optimizer

Comments.Message:
I don't know how I managed to post before I typed anything other than a salutation.

Anyway, when I first downloaded Rawr (this would be v.13.1), I used to get a big red X in the window where they show the items and the little bar charts. 

In Rawr 14.1, this went away, such that to the right of my equipment I can see the bar charts for items ranked by DPS, depending on which slot I click. I love it.

However, when I use the Rawr Optimizer to create a list of upgrades (I forget the exact name of the option ... it just makes one list in a new window that has the DPS increase for each potential upgrade), I have two issues:

First, I get an error, and a huge red X instead of the list of item upgrades. If I hover my mouse over various spots on the window, the popup text still appears for the item I guess is being hidden under the X.  So, they're there, I just can't see them. 

The other thing is that the list seems to include items I didn't check for the optimizer to use, like the Soul Render, which I will never, ever, ever get and therefore specifically did not bother to check. 

If needs be, I can post the error message when I get home from work. I have Windows Vista, and it won't let me install .net 2.0 because it says it's already included in Vista.

Thanks

The error message is as follows. If your comments are displayed newest first, please read the first comment for the problem.

Thanks:
